name: Melty Blood: Actress Again: Current Code
overview:
Melty Blood: Actress Again: Current Code is a 2D fighter that was ported from the PlayStation 2 to the arcade. The game underwent location testing in Akihabara, Japan from December 19–20, 2009 and hit arcades on July 29, 2010. It runs on Sega's RingWide board, the successor to the NAOMI boards that Act Cadenza and the original Actress Again were developed on.

An upgrade for Current Code was launched on May 18, 2011, branded as Ver. 1.05, and added two new characters and made some changes to the gameplay. A final update came out on October 14, 2011 as Ver. 1.07b for the Sega RingEdge 2.
